description.value: This optical device bends light around you. It must be installed in a suit of armor for 24 hours before it functions, and when the upgrade is removed from the armor, no other upgrade can use its vacated slot for 24 hours. You can activate the displacement field as a move action to gain the benefits of a displacement spell until you spend another move action to deactivate it or it runs out of charges. A displacement fieldâ€™s charges replenish each day.
